titleStmt.title: To the honourable The House of Commons in Parliament assembled: a brief scheme humbly presented, for raising 40000 l. per annum with great facility by a duty that may be laid on the postage of letters, viz.
titleStmt.author: Weston, Charles.
Weston, Matthew.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed April 12. 1695. and reprinted March 20. 1696. for Charles and Matthew Weston,

notesStmt.note: Place and actual date of publication from Wing.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
